data.text: @W1nston984 @StephS57880241 @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer Exactly. Tribalism is ruining the country. If the right get's authoritarian, I'll shift left, because I know those new powers that party seized will eventually be used against me. Basic human rights should be the most important thing for everyone.

@ElonSuper @StephS57880241 @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer It always was ironic to me to watch the left yell “tyrant” at Trump while the technocrats and mass media literally censored him while the president of the United States. The lefts use of authoritarianism while proclaiming their oppositions as “authoritarian” is so illogical

@StephS57880241 @W1nston984 @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer That's literally not fascism. That' authoritarianism. You keep conflating the word to mean "bad stuff". You know who also burned books... literally every dictator. Like Stalin or Mao. It's a form of censorship, something you already advocated for.

@StephS57880241 @W1nston984 @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer @HopkinsMedicine Pretty sure John Hopkins isn't the supreme court. Not sure why they would have anything to do with determining rights. Trans people have the same rights as everyone else. You don't get special rights because you take drugs to alter your appearance.

@StephS57880241 @HolyFace9 @W1nston984 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer God is all about love, 100%. But that doesn't mean objective truths are flexible. If you want to say the earth is flat, I'm not going to be mean to you, but I will point out the flaw if you ask. Likewise, being obsessed w/ one's own gender or identity, is nothing but vanity.

@StephS57880241 @HolyFace9 @W1nston984 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer Gender isn't assigned by society... it not a coincidence that in ever single culture, society & language have the exact same genders. Objectively men are stronger, women are objectively less violent. It's clearly nature... IF you have to take drugs to change, that's not society
@StephS57880241 @ElonSuper @W1nston984 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer They are working on it. https://t.co/HYJBZjg6vr
@W1nston984 @StephS57880241 @ElonSuper @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer @HopkinsMedicine Protected Class is the same as mental disorder. https://t.co/jES6DiA2FK

@StephS57880241 @ElonSuper @HolyFace9 @BiancaTheBrave @joerogan @CNN @MSNBC @Merck @pfizer To assume makes an ASS of U and ME. Next time, don’t make assumptions so quickly (as I did presuming the heart attack was fatal - for which I apologized and revised the tweet).
